articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine and chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization, on August 15.
					 The president in the message said that he was pleased to send heartfelt warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un on behalf of the state and people of Palestine and on his own behalf on the occasion of the liberation day for which the people of Korea made dearest sacrifices for freedom and dignity.
					
					 I highly appreciate you for sending invariable support to the just struggle of our people to end the occupation of Palestine and realize the right to found an independent state with East Kuds as its capital city, the message said, adding:
					
					 Our right and just struggle provide a firm guarantee for realizing fair peace desired by all the people in Middle East.
					
					 I hope your friendly people greater stability and prosperity and the historic friendly relations between our two peoples further development.   I wish Your Excellency good health and happiness.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets Political Party Leaders of Mexico and Nepal
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets Political Party Leaders of Mexico and Nepal
Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Wednesday separately met and had talk with Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the C.C., People's Socialist Party of Mexico who is chairman of the Mexico Preparatory Committee for the Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, and C. P. Mainali, general secretary of the C.C., Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist) who is chairman of the Nepalese National Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il, and his party. 
					 They are participating in the 5th International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu.

articles.title: Russian Charge d'Affaires Ad Interim Gives Reception
articles.content:
Russian Charge d'Affaires Ad Interim Gives Reception
Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Minaev, charge d'Affaires ad interim of the Russian embassy here, gave a reception Wednesday on the occasion of the 72nd anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Present there on invitation were Vice Foreign Minister Sin Hong Chol and others.
					
					 Staff members of the Russian embassy were present.
					
					 Earlier, the Russian consulate general in Chongjin gave a similar reception.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Surveys Pyongyang Automation Appliances Factory
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Surveys Pyongyang Automation Appliances Factory
Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the WPK Central Committee, inspected the Pyongyang Automation Appliances Factory.
					 He looked round the room for the education in the revolutionary history and the room dedicated to the history of the factory.
					
					 He encouraged workers making innovative achievements in production.
					
					 A consultative meeting held on the spot underscored the importance of the task facing the factory in sprucing up Samjiyon County, associated with the history of hard-fought struggle waged by President Kim Il Sung, and the native county of leader Kim Jong Il, as an example county and a standard county befitting the holy land of the revolution.
					
					 Choe stressed the need for officials, workers and technicians of the factory to raise their responsibility and role in ensuring timely production of various switchboards needed for sprucing up Samjiyon County.

articles.title: Silk Banners, Medals, Honorary Titles, Prizes, Diplomas, Gifts to Peerlessly Great Persons of Mt Paektu
articles.content:
Silk Banners, Medals, Honorary Titles, Prizes, Diplomas, Gifts to Peerlessly Great Persons of Mt Paektu
Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The peerlessly great persons of Mt Paektu were presented with silk banners, medals, honorary titles, prizes, diplomas and gifts by International and Regional Preparatory Committees for the Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, international democratic organizations, foreign political parities, organizations and organs and figures of various circles on the occasion of the Fifth International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu. 
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received silk banners from the International, Asia-Pacific, African, Arab, American, European and Oceanic Regional Preparatory Committees for the Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il, anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un were awarded honorary medals by the Australia-DPRK Association for Friendship and Culture and honorary citizenship certificates by the government of San Miguel City, Bolivar Province, Ecuador.
					
					 The Manuel Scorsa Institute of Culture of Peru and the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee presented diplomas to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il were presented with diplomas by the Federation of the International Peace Fund of Russia and Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un with diplomas of the great men in the century by the Sri Lanka-People's Korea Friendship Association.
					
					 Kim Jong Un received a medal to mark the 50th founding anniversary of the Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America, and certificate for honorary leader from the Soekarno Foundation for Education of Indonesia.
					
					 DPRK heroine Kim Jong Suk prize was presented by the Mongolian HUM Company Ltd., diploma of the great hero in the century from the Nepal Journalist Association and diplomas by the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK and the Kuwait Asian Journalist Association.

articles.title: Scientists, Technicians and Officials of NADA Meet Participants in Int'l Festival
articles.content:
Scientists, Technicians and Officials of NADA Meet Participants in Int'l Festival
Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting between scientists, technicians and officials of the DPRK National Aerospace Development Administration (NADA) and the participants in the 5th International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu took place at the Sci-Tech Complex on Wednesday.
					 An official and scientist of the NADA said in their speeches about the history of the DPRK's space development and the successes achieved in the field of manufacturing and launching techniques of satellites.
					
					 They expressed their determination to demonstrate the appearance of the great Paektusan nation to the world by glorifying Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea as the space power of Juche admired by the world true to the intention of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Participants in the 5th International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu made speeches.
					
					 They stressed that the intrepid spirit of the DPRK which towered as one of a few satellite manufacturers and launchers in the world by smashing harsh political and economic sanctions of the hostile forces by dint of self-reliance and self-development is striking the world with wonder.
					
					 The speakers called for the world's progressives to further intensify the international movement supporting the peaceful space development of the DPRK.
					
					 The silk banner and science and technology books in the name of the participants in the 5th International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu were conveyed to the NADA at the meeting.

articles.title: Meeting for Solidarity with Korean People Held
articles.content:
Meeting for Solidarity with Korean People Held
Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting for solidarity with the Korean people at the People's Palace of Culture Wednesday in the joint name of the International Preparatory Committee for the Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu and the Korean Committee for Solidarity with the World People (KCSWP)
					 Present there were Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and chairwoman of the KCSWP, and officials of public organizations including the KCSWP, the National Peace Committee of Korea and the Democratic Lawyers Association of Korea.
					
					 Present there were co-chairmen of the International Preparatory Committee for the Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu including Helmi El Hadidi, chairman of the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization, figures of political parties of different countries and organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people and representatives of international democratic organizations against imperialism.
					
					 Speeches were made by Lourdes Cervantes, secretary general of the Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America,  Chap Nhalyvoud, chairman of the FUNCINPEC Party of Cambodia, Fumihiro Himori, chairman of the Japan Committee for the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea who is co-chairman of the International Preparatory Committee for the Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy who is chairman of the UK Preparatory Committee for the Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, and Iraklis Tsavdaridis, executive secretary of the World Peace Council.
					
					 The speakers highly praised President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as the world elder statesmen and generals of Mt Paektu.
					
					 They said that the DPRK towered as a nuclear power of Juche and world's military power thanks to the leadership of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They denounced evermore escalated moves of the U.S. and its vassal forces to isolate and stifle the DPRK as the barbarous acts aimed to deprive the DPRK of its sovereignty and right to existence and development and wring the windpipe of the Korean nation.
					
					 The world progressives will always stand by the Korean people and express invariable solidarity to them, they noted.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk in her speech expressed thanks to the foreign friends for voicing full support and solidarity to the just cause of the Korean people.
					
					 No one can block the Korean people from advancing toward the final victory under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, she declared.
					
					 A resolution of the meeting and a letter to the UN secretary general in the name of the participants in the meeting were adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Participants in Solidarity Meeting with Korean People Send Letter to UN Secretary General
articles.content:
Participants in Solidarity Meeting with Korean People Send Letter to UN Secretary General
Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The participants in the solidarity meeting with the Korean people held here sent a letter to the UN secretary general Wednesday in the joint name of the International Preparatory Committee of the Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu and the Korean Committee for Solidarity with the World People.
					 The letter said that the situation on the Korean peninsula is growing tense day by day and arouses serious concern of the international community despite the desire of humankind for global peace, security and common prosperity. 
					
					 The main cause that failed to defuse the tension on the peninsula is that outside forces are persisting to seek their interests against the DPRK, it noted, adding: The U.S. is pursuing the anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK, evading the peace-loving proposals of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and its vassal forces persistently use the name of the UN in the moves to attain their vicious purpose of isolating and stifling the DPRK and the UN supports the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, far from considering respect and impartiality for sovereign states as its life and soul, it pointed out
					
					 It said that the DPRK's nuclear test, satellite launch and ballistic missile launch are the just right of sovereign state for self-defense and there is no article stipulating that this "threatens global peace and security" in the UN Charter and UN general assembly resolutions.
					
					 It noted that "sanction resolutions" of the UN Security Council against the DPRK are the illegal documents fabricated by particular politically-motivated purposes.
					
					 The letter strongly urged the UN secretary general and the UN Office to drop sanctions against the DPRK in conformity with the mission of the UN seeking to global peace and security and development common to mankind.

articles.title: Ceremony Held to Award Prizes to Winners of International Contest for Books and Literary Works
articles.content:
Ceremony Held to Award Prizes to Winners of International Contest for Books and Literary Works
Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) - There was a ceremony of awarding prizes to the winners of the international contest for books and literary works at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday on the occasion of the 5th International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu. 
					 Present there were Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, officials of the C.C., the Writers Union of Korea and the C.C., the Journalists Union of Korea and officials concerned.
					
					 Present there were personages of different countries who produced books and literary works in praise of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu.
					
					 Diplomas and prizes were awarded to 15 persons including Adamos Katsantonis, chairman of the Cyprus-DPRK Cultural Friendship Association, Argentinean Writer Jorge Luis Ubertali and Takashi Nada, representative of the Ehime Institute for Contemporary Korean Issue in Japan.
					
					 Diplomas of DPRK honorary writer and honorary journalist were awarded to M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, and Sergei, editor-in-chief of the Belarusian magazine Social Education.
					
					 Speeches were made at the ceremony.
					
					 Hyon Sung Nam, vice-chairman of the C.C., the Writers Union of Korea, congratulated the awardees and expressed belief that writers of different countries who love justice and peace would produce more good works in the future, too.
					
					 Abdoulaye Diallo, chairman of the Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea, said he deemed it honor to devote wisdom and enthusiasm to creating poems glorifying the feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as an honorary writer of the DPRK. 
					
					 He reiterated his will to devote himself to praising the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu.

articles.title: Employees of Industrial Establishments Support DPRK Government's Statement
articles.content:
Employees of Industrial Establishments Support DPRK Government's Statement
Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Mass Rallies took place at industrial establishments across the country to fully support the DPRK government's statement.
					 A statement was read out at the rallies to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The speakers bitterly denounced the UN "sanctions resolution" cooked up by the U.S. and its hostile forces a wanton encroachment on the sovereignty of the DPRK. 
					
					 They said that the army and people of the DPRK feel relieved, hearing the statement of a spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army which serves as the stronger warning signal to cope with the reckless military pressure of the U.S. imperialists and the statement of a spokesman for the Strategic Force of the KPA on the plan for mounting an enveloping strike at Guam.
					
					 They expressed their determination to increase the production in the spirit of beating back the enemies working hard to obliterate the sovereignty, the right to existence and development and thus resolutely frustrate the U.S. imperialists' harsh sanctions upon the DPRK.

articles.title: Electric-power Production Goes up in DPRK
articles.content:
Electric-power Production Goes up in DPRK
Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Workers in the field of electric-power production in the DPRK are striving to ease the strain on power under the banner of self-reliance.
					 According to Kim Yong Chol, vice-minister of Electric Power Industry, workers have performed new miracles and innovations in power production every day with the will to frustrate the mean and imprudent sanctions and provocations of the U.S.
					
					 Bearing in mind the truth that self-reliance and self-sufficiency are the only way to survive, workers in the field of thermal power plants have taken measures for decisively increasing the consecutive operating time of generating equipment.
					
					 The Pyongyang and Pukchang thermal power complexes applied firing technology without heavy oil by their own efforts and newly remodeled turbines and generators. The East Pyongyang Thermal Power Plant is introducing a technology for stabilizing the high temperature air combustion into production.
					
					 Successes have also been witnessed in hydro-power stations.
					
					 The Suphung, Sodusu, Hochongang and Thaechon hydro-power stations have overfulfilled their daily production quotas by controlling the quantity of water and managing equipment in a proper way.
					
					 A new-type of turbine blade, digital integrated protective device and digital electric speed regulator were manufactured and introduced into generators. 
					
					 Meanwhile, a work is also brisk for generating tens of thousands of kWs of electricity by introducing a computer-based optimization method for water management.

articles.title: Poems Produced in DPRK
articles.content:
Poems Produced in DPRK
Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Korean poets produced poems calling upon the army and people to the do-or-die battle against the U.S.
					 Poets of the C.C., the Writers Union of Korea produced more than 30 poems including "We are led by General Kim Jong Un".
					
					 The poems stir up the enthusiasm to take a thousand-fold revenge upon the enemy.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praise Immortal Feats Peerlessly Great Men of Mt Paektu Performed before Country and Nation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praise Immortal Feats Peerlessly Great Men of Mt Paektu Performed before Country and Nation
Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK pay the highest tribute and offer the deepest gratitude to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who performed immortal feats before the country and the nation with their outstanding idea and leadership.
					 Rodong Sinmun says in an article Wednesday:
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, faithful successor to the intention of the great leaders, is building up mighty strength for the final victory in the showdown with the U.S. and the building of a powerful socialist nation.
					
					 His steadfast faith to put a definite end to the several decade-long U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and nuclear threat and blackmail rapidly increased the DPRK's capability for self-defense with the nuclear force as a pivot and brought about the miracles in the world which put the DPRK's overall national power and strategic position on the highest level.
					
					 The world people are unanimous in assessing that the DPRK has recorded the tradition of victory while standing in confrontation with the U.S., boasting of being the strongest in the world, thanks to the Juche idea and the Songun politics founded and enforced by the great leaders and the leadership of Kim Jong Un who is carrying forward them without an inch of deflection. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will further reinforce the nuclear treasure for self-defense, the lifeline of the nation that can not be bartered for anything and a national treasure of reunified Korea, holding aloft the banner of the new line of simultaneously developing the two fronts under the wise leadership of the respected Supreme Leader and dynamically advance for prosperity with the power, spirit and speed of Korea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Il Sung's Feats for Korea's Liberation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Il Sung's Feats for Korea's Liberation
Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The realization of the cause of Korea's liberation by President Kim Il Sung was a historic event that brought about an epochal turn in carving out the destiny of the Korean nation and realizing the human cause of independence, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 Important in glorifying forever the feats the President performed in liberating Korea is to reunify it without fail, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The country pictured by him in the forest of Mt Paektu was one Korea prospering as one territory.
					
					 To the Korean people who sustained the pain of national division and the war disaster imposed by the U.S. imperialists, national reunification is the supreme task and the cherished desire which can never be delayed.
					
					 National reunification was the top priority task for the President, a man of noble and deep patriotism.
					
					 Taking to his heart the pain suffered by the nation due to the division of the country, the President worked heart and soul to convey the reunified country to the future generations till the last moments of his life.
					
					 The line of genuine national independence, line of patriotism and line for national reunification clarified by the President at each stage of the revolutionary struggle shine as the eternal treasure of the nation.

articles.title: Sexual Crime Is Disease Endemic to S. Korean Diplomacy: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Sexual Crime Is Disease Endemic to S. Korean Diplomacy: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Foreign Ministry recently indicted the south Korean ambassador to Ethiopia to prosecution. The charge is a sexual abuse. It is the first time in history that the incumbent south Korean ambassador abroad is indicted to the puppet prosecution.
					 In July a high-ranking diplomat of the puppet embassy abroad was dismissed on charges of sexual assault against a woman employee.
					
					 A commentary of Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this proves once again that the south Korean puppet diplomats are representatives of corruption and depravity who resort to filthy things.
					
					 Citing facts to prove that sexual crimes are a disease endemic to the puppet diplomacy, the commentary goes on:
					
					 The puppet diplomats profess gentlemen but they are immoral men committing sexual abuses in a competitive way.
					
					 South Korean diplomats commit sex-related crimes everywhere they go, to say nothing of Asia, Africa and America. 
					
					This clearly points to the moral vulgarity of the present south Korean authorities and south Korean society.
					
					 Such men are working with bloodshot eyes to incite confrontation with the fellow countrymen even at the UN under the pretexts of "threat" and "provocation".
					
					 Kang Kyong Hwa, boss of the puppet Foreign Ministry, den of sexual criminals, is faulting the DPRK's legitimate measures for modernizing nuclear force, while shelving the vulgarity of her own shameful men. This is a ridiculous and utterly disgusting political cartoon.
					
					 It is shame on world diplomacy that the worst men of depravity and immorality take floors of international conferences while styling themselves diplomats.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Should Not Mock at DPRK with Such Rhetoric as "Simultaneous Development of Pressure and Dialogue"
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Should Not Mock at DPRK with Such Rhetoric as "Simultaneous Development of Pressure and Dialogue"
Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces are speaking of "dialogue" while taking an active part in the U.S. moves for putting sanctions on the DPRK. This is shameless and unreasonable sophism, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary.
					 The puppet authorities are calling for "simultaneous development of pressure and dialogue", indicative of their intention to deny and hinder dialogue forever, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 They are conducting provocative saber-rattling such as joint air attack drill and combined ballistic missile drill after bringing into the areas around the Korean peninsula the U.S. strategic assets despite their lip-service for "dialogue", thus rendering the situation extremely tense.
					
					 The situation clearly proves that the shameless "dialogue" rhetoric touted by the puppet forces is nothing but a sugar-coated word to cover up their dark intention to escalate confrontation with the fellow countrymen.
					
					 Dialogue is not a veil for covering up their attempt at confrontation.
					
					 The puppet group of traitors should not try to mock at the DPRK through such rhetoric as "simultaneous development of pressure and dialogue".
					
					 Their efforts for putting sanctions on the fellow countrymen in collusion with outsiders to stifle the fellow countrymen and their impudent attempt to kick up the racket for escalating military confrontation backed by the rhetoric of "simultaneous development of pressure and dialogue" will only push the north-south relations to a catastrophe, and the south Korean authorities will be made to hold full responsibility for ensuing serious consequences.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Send Back DPRK Women
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Send Back DPRK Women
Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Recent revelation puts it that the south Korean puppet authorities are cooking up a story to give impression that the DPRK women whom they keep in custody in south Korea after forcibly taking them to it have "settled there and lead a stable life" according to their will, by way of forcing them into "coercive marriage".
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary says this is a thrice-cursed crime disregarding human ethics and nation and a vicious challenge to the DPRK's demand for their repatriation.
					
					 The news analyst goes on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities are resorting to a sordid farce to keep the DPRK women in south Korea in a coercive manner. This clearly proves that their much-touted "dialogue" and "humanitarianism" are just hypocrisy to mislead the public opinion and that their intention is to calm down the DPRK's demand for repatriation and to stand in confrontation with it.
					
					 It will be a misjudgment for the south Korean authorities if they think they can cover up the truth behind forcible kidnapping of the DPRK women and evade the repatriation issue through such dirty farce. They should clearly understand that the more they drag on the time, the more it will be unfavorable for them.
					
					 They are setting afloat groundless assertions and resorting to a sleight of hand to evade the repatriation of the DPRK women. This will only touch off stronger indignation of the DPRK and demand from inside and outside for the repatriation. This will also cause deserved punishment.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should immediately send back Kim Ryon Hui who is wishing for her return to the fold of the DPRK after her having been taken to the south by trick and deception. They should pay heed to the right advice of the DPRK that they will be made to lose everything if they delay the repatriation of those whom they kidnapped to the south.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Slams U.S. for Bringing Danger of Nuclear War
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Slams U.S. for Bringing Danger of Nuclear War
Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The Family Movement for Realizing Democracy in south Korea held the 1133rd Thursday meeting in Seoul on Aug. 10 demanding the release of prisoners of conscience and the abrogation of the "Security Law" at which they denounced the U.S. for its moves to ignite a new war on the Korean peninsula, according to the south Korean online paper Jaju Sibo.
					The speakers said that more than 2,000 figures of south Korea and other parts of the world sent a letter to the authorities calling for the release of the prisoners of conscience on Aug. 9 and the present chief executive should immediately release the prisoners of conscience who sacrificed themselves for the sake of democracy and the reunification of the country.
					
					 They said that the U.S. is the one which stirred up a war on the Korean peninsula, not the north, and Trump let out a flurry of such nonsense as "fire and fury", escalating the situation on the peninsula.
					
					 Only when the U.S. forces are withdrawn from south Korea and the U.S. hostile policy toward the north retracted, can true peace settle on the peninsula, they noted.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Demands U.S. Quit Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Demands U.S. Quit Korean Peninsula
Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The Vanguard for Unification against the U.S. in south Korea held a rally in Seoul on August 12 and demanded the U.S. quit south Korea, according to Jaju Sibo, south Korean internet newspaper.
					 Recalling the U.S. chief executive's recent remarks that if there breaks out a war, it will be on the Korean peninsula and he does not care even thousands die on it, the speakers said that this is intolerable.
					
					 They expressed concern about the danger of the Korean peninsula as the U.S. is sparking a war while talking about "preventive war" which spoilt south Korea and took away many human lives.
					
					 They demanded that the U.S. hold a white flag, apologize for its mistake and withdraw its forces from south Korea if it wants to save its face and maintain the country.
					
					 They also demanded the U.S. chief executive stop rhetoric and quit the Korean peninsula, while paying heed to the advice at home and abroad.
					
					 The purpose of struggle of the Vanguard is to drive the U.S. out of south Korea, they said, calling for seeing through the essential nature of the U.S. and pool efforts to defend peace on the Korean peninsula and check the deployment of THAAD.
					
					 At the end of the rally, the Vanguard thrust a letter of protest to the U.S. embassy.

articles.title: Maltreatment of Soldiers by S. Korean  Puppet High-ranking Officers Revealed
articles.content:
Maltreatment of Soldiers by S. Korean  Puppet High-ranking Officers Revealed
Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The revelation of maltreatment of soldiers by high-ranking officers of the south Korean puppet army has touched off big indignation in south Korea, according to KBS of south Korea on Aug. 13.
					 This fact was revealed through investigation conducted from August 4 to 11 among more than 100 soldiers suffering from hard work at houses of 90 senior officers of the puppet military.
					
					 The investigation proved that not a few high-ranking officers treated soldiers like slaves at their houses.

articles.title: DPRK Is Sure to Win Final Victory: Pakistani Bodies
articles.content:
DPRK Is Sure to Win Final Victory: Pakistani Bodies
Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- We are sure that the DPRK will further develop the strongest strategic weapons and Juche weapons, demonstrating before the world its dignity and might as a nuclear power of Juche, the world's military power in the future and thus win the final victory in the standoff with the U.S. imperialists under the wise guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 The Pakistan Association for Self-Reliance Studies and the Karachi Juche Study Center of Pakistan said this in a joint statement on Aug. 1 hailing the DPRK's successful second test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The test-launch of ICBM reconfirmed the reliability of the ICBM system and displayed the ability to suddenly launch ICBM anywhere anytime, a stern warning to the U.S. engrossed in sanctions, blockade and military threat against the DPRK.
					
					 It also clearly demonstrated that for the Korean people, the powerful war deterrent for national defense is valuable strategic assets which are irreversible and irreplaceable.

articles.title: Peruvian Figure Congratulates DPRK on Successful Test-launch of ICBM
articles.content:
Peruvian Figure Congratulates DPRK on Successful Test-launch of ICBM
Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Kati Campos,  secretary general of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, issued a statement on Aug. 3 to congratulate the DPRK on its second successful test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14.
					 He said:
					
					 The success in another test-launch of ICBM is a great event that demonstrated once again the will of the Workers' Party of Korea and the government of the DPRK to defend the sovereignty of the country and socialism and guarantee peace on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of the world.
					
					 This is greatly encouraging the progressives in their struggle against aggression and interference by the U.S. imperialists and their high-handed and arbitrary practices.
					
					 We highly praise President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for building powerful socialist Korea admired by the world and glorifying it and the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un for firmly defending their ideas and cause.
					
					 We will stand firm by the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in the future, too, in their struggle for the building of a powerful socialist country and the independent reunification of the country, smashing the U.S. moves to stifle the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del Presidente palestino
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del Presidente palestino
Pyongyang, 16 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 15 Mahmoud Abbas, Presidente del Estado de Palestina y del Comite Ejecutivo de la Organizacion de Liberacion Palestina.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					Me siento alegre por enviar a Su Excelencia la sincera felicitacion en nombre del Estado y pueblo palestinos y en el mio propio con motivo del dia de liberacion, que logro vuestro pueblo a cambio de los sacrificios mas caros para su libertad y su dignidad. 
					
					Evaluo de alto que Su Excelencia envia la invariable solidaridad con la justa lucha de nuestro pueblo por acabar con la ocupacion de Palestina y por el derecho a fundar un Estado soberano con Kuds oriental como su capital y su empeno por lograrlo.
					
					Nuestro derecho y nuestra lucha justa devienen la firme garantia para realizar la paz imparcial, aspirada por todos los pueblos de la region de Medio Oriente.
					
					Deseo que vuestro pueblo amistoso tenga una gran estabilidad y prosperidad y que se desarrollen mas las historicas relaciones de amistad entre los pueblos de nuestros dos paises. Y formulo votos por la buena salud y felicidad de Su Excelencia.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong se reune con lideres de partidos mexicano y nepales
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong se reune con lideres de partidos mexicano y nepales
Pyongyang, 16 de agosto (ACNC) -- Ri Su Yong, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, departio el dia 16 por separado con Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Popular Socialista de Mexico y presidente del comite preparatorio mexicano para el Congreso de Elogio a los Grandes Hombres del Monte Paektu de 2017, y C. P. Mainali, secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Comunista Nepales (Marxista-Leninista) y presidente del Comite Nacional de Nepal en memoria de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, y su comitiva. 
					Los huespedes extranjeros participan en el V Festival Internacional de Homenaje a los Grandes Hombres del Monte Paektu.

articles.title: Cientificos, tecnicos y funcionarios coreanos se reunen con participantes en festival internacional
articles.content:
Cientificos, tecnicos y funcionarios coreanos se reunen con participantes en festival internacional
Pyongyang, 16 de agosto (ACNC) -- Los cientificos, tecnicos y funcionarios de la Administracion Nacional de Desarrollo Aeroespacial de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se reunieron el dia 16 en el Palacio de Ciencias y Tecnicas con los participantes en el V Festival Internacional de Homenaje a los Grandes Hombres del Monte Paektu.
					En sus discursos pronunciados en la ocasion, un funcionario y un cientifico coreanos se refirieron a la historia de desarrollo aeroespacial de la RPDC y a los exitos logrados en la fabricacion y lanzamiento de satelites artificiales.
					
					Expresaron la decision de demostrar a todo el mundo el aspecto majestuoso de la potencia Paektusan al convertir la Corea de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en potencia aeroespacial del Juche, admirada por el mundo, cumpliendo el proposito del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					Intervinieron tambien las personalidades extranjeras participantes en el V Festival Internacional de Homenaje a los Grandes Hombres del Monte Paektu.
					
					Apuntaron que causa la admiracion del mundo la imagen indoblegable de Corea que emergio como uno de los pocos paises fabricadores y lanzadores del satelite artificial frustrando con el espiritu de autofortalecimiento la brutal sancion politica y economica de las fuerzas hostiles.
					
					Exhortaron a los pueblos progresistas del mundo a intensificar el movimiento solidario internacional para apoyar el desarrollo aeroespacial de la RPDC con fines pacificos.
					
					En la ocasion fueron entregados a la Administracion Nacional de Desarrollo Aeroespacial la bandera de felicitacion y los libros de ciencias y tecnicas en nombre de los participantes en el festival.

articles.title: Participantes en mitin solidario envian carta al secretario general de la ONU
articles.content:
Participantes en mitin solidario envian carta al secretario general de la ONU
Pyongyang, 16 de agosto (ACNC) -- Los participantes en el mitin de solidaridad con el pueblo coreano, efectuado en esta capital, enviaron el dia 16 al secretario general de la ONU una carta en nombre comun del Comite Preparatorio Internacional para el Congreso de Elogio a los Grandes Hombres del Monte Paektu de 2017 y el Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con los Pueblos del Mundo.
					A pesar de la aspiracion de la humanidad a la paz, seguridad y coprosperidad del mundo, la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana va de mal en peor causando seria preocupacion de la sociedad internacional, comienza la misiva y continua:
					
					El factor principal de ello es la intervencion de las fuerzas extranjeras que persiguen solo sus intereses en Corea.
					
					Dando espaldas a la propuesta pacifista de la RPDC, EE.UU. sigue practicando la anacronica politica hostil contra ella.
					
					EE.UU. y las fuerzas satelites continuan abusando de la etiqueta de la ONU para alcanzar su sucio objetivo de aislar y aplastar a la RPDC mientras la ONU, que debe tomar como su vida el respeto y la imparcialidad sobre el Estado soberano, se suma tambien a la politica hostil anticoreana de EE.UU.
					
					La prueba nuclear y los lanzamientos de satelite artificial y cohete balistico son el justo derecho autodefensivo de un Estado soberano y no hay en ninguna parte, tanto en la Carta de la ONU como en las resoluciones de su Asamblea General, el articulo que los haya estipulado como "amenaza a la paz y seguridad internacionales".
					
					Las "resoluciones de sancion" contra la RPDC del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU son documentos ilegales que parten del designio politico especifico.
					
					El secretario general y el Secretariado de la ONU deben levantar la sancion contra la RPDC conforme a la mision de esa organizacion multinacional que persigue la paz y seguridad internacionales y el desarrollo comun de la humanidad.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exige al Sur de Corea devolver sin demora a ciudadanas de RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exige al Sur de Corea devolver sin demora a ciudadanas de RPDC
Pyongyang, 16 de agosto (ACNC) -- Recientemente, fue revelado nuevo hecho de que al obligarles el "matrimonio" a las ciudadanas retenidas de la RPDC, las autoridades surcoreanas tratan de dar una impresion como si ellas "llevan una vida estable asentando voluntariamente" en el suelo surcoreano.
					En un comentario individual de hoy, el diario Rodong Sinmun lo denuncia como el crimen antietico y antinacional y un desafio siniestro a la demanda de su connacional por la devolucion de sus ciudadanas, y prosigue:
					
					Con ese complot barato, las autoridades surcoreanas mostraron que sus insistencias en el "dialogo" y el "humanitarismo" no pasan de ser una retorica hipocrita y que su objetivo reside en enfrentarse con la RPDC rechazando la exigencia interna y externa por la devolucion de las norcoreanas.  
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas no deben abrigar la estupida idea de que con tal farsa podran encubrir la verdad del incidente y silenciar el tema de devolucion, sino tener presente que se hallaran en la situacion desfavorable mas con el paso del tiempo.
					
					Cuanto mas se esfuerzan desesperadamente para evitar la devolucion de las norcoreanas difundiendo las absurdas insistencias, tanto mas se aumentaran la ira de la RPDC y la demanda interna y externa por la repatriacion. Y la responsabilidad total de caso recaera sobre las autoridades surcoreanas.  
					
					En esta oportunidad, las autoridades surcoreanas deben devolver sin demora tambien a Kim Ryon Hui quien fue llevada forzosamente al suelo surcoreano siendo victima del engano y trampa y quiere regresar ahora a la RPDC.
					
					Ellas tienen que escuchar con seriedad nuestro consejo justo  de que lo perderan todo si demoran la devolucion de las secuestradas.
